website_summaries.verdict: High-quality materials and comfortable fit with sizes to accommodate children and adults. Quality guarantee and great customer service from manufacturer.
pros: Made with durable, non-toxic, ultra-thick PVC
Inside handles promote stability and protect arms during field play
Comfortable shoulder straps for a secure fit to avoid excessive jostling
Comes in variety of colors and designs if you’re buying for a bubble ball league
cons: Issues with inflating and damaged product out of package
Inconsistent sizing when it comes to teens

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: The child was very happy to see it and couldn't wait to open it. We inflated it, used a small air pump, filled it with air in as little as 10 minutes, and now it swells. Maybe you can use a large air pump to shorten the inflation time. We brought it to the lawn of the park and started our game. During the play, we encountered some branches, stones, etc., without scratching. It can be seen that the wall is thick and strong. We are very happy, we often take it to the park to play. We all love it.
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these as gifts for my 11 year old daughter. Bought the bigger size so adults could have fun too. She loves them as does her 9 year old brother. They are very sturdy. We had 20 girls over for a bday party and all were using them and having a great time. We leave them outside in the shade and haven't had a problem with them deflating. Had to buy a quality pump from the nearby sporting goods store b/c I didn't realize it didn't come with a pump. Apparently I didn't read the details. So that was the only downfall when we received them.
customer_reviews.author: AZMOM

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Fun
customer_reviews.text: As part of my bucket list, my wonderful family bought me these for my birthday this summer. Very fun BUT very hot in the summer sun. Will use more often as the weather cools - perhaps a little bubble soccer! Very well made, sturdy, maintains inflation well over time.
customer_reviews.author: Kaz

customer_reviews.title: A fun product that will kee you going for hours!
customer_reviews.text: This product is probably one of the most fun yet wackiest products I’ve ever gotten. Once I learned how to set up, it was really hard to stop. Me and my friends spent hours with it and I can’t wait until next summer.
customer_reviews.author: joshua davis

customer_reviews.title: Be sure u have storage space
customer_reviews.text: Frat fun. Sturdy. Everyone in my family has a great time from 5’5” daughter to 6’ son to 200 lb husband. It takes a long time to inflate even with an air compressor so be sure you have storage room. You won’t want to deflate between uses. We have 2 of them and thankfully have a large garage.
customer_reviews.author: ellen dellicolli

customer_reviews.title: Great fun! Great quality! Hit of the party!
customer_reviews.text: These were the hit of our daughter’s grad party! Everyone loved them from young to old! We did have a handle break on one of them (on the inside) but I think it was more from over use by big teenage boys than anything else. We took the advice of earlier reviews and blew them up using a leaf blower. Then, used a smaller electric pump to finish as to not over inflate them. Our older son also used these for a bachelor party, and again, they were a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Jfcoll

customer_reviews.title: Awesome company and products
customer_reviews.text: This company cares about its name and reputation and have integrity! It was really an amazing experience dealing with them. I ordered 2 bumper balls for my teenagers and when we got them, one of them had some issues and was deflating quickly, I contacted the seller, they answered me quickly, sent me a replacement for the bumper ball within 3 days! They really went above and beyond and they were really awesome. Loved their products and my kids love their bumper balls. I Will definitely buy again from them and would recommend everyone who wants bumper balls to buy from them.
customer_reviews.author: Muna

customer_reviews.title: Fun times
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun experience Took it to the soccer field next to my house my cousin brought his. Getting my other family members to get one so we can play bumper ball soccer against each other. Make sure to have a vacuum or a air mattress inflator with you
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: I wish they could be a bit more affordable, but I've been having fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and it is fun for a little while to run around, bounce, and tumble, but it gets old kinda fast. I'm trying to convince my friends to buy some so we can play a fun game of soccer...
customer_reviews.author: Molly Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very thick and sturdy. Feel very high quality.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! We got two so they could play together with them and bounce off each other and they love them. They are sturdy and very thick and seem to hold their air very well so far. A month later.
customer_reviews.author: A. Boekenoogen

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried to rent these and go somewhere where we could use them and it was over $500 for 3 people. I purchased these and my family and I LOVE them!!! Sturdy and easy to use!!
customer_reviews.author: DanyellaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are very heavy duty! They were perfect for our youth camp! They are a little heavy for kids under 10, but absolutely perfect for anyone older. We played soccer, bump, bowling, and lots more. They kids had a blast with these. Again, they are fantastic quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit at our son’s family birthday party. He turned 5 and loved doing flips all around the yard. Bigger kids and adults had a great time bumping and flipping too. On a hot day, they can be a bit sticky so wear sleeves. Takes some skill to try to stand up after falling over. Bought 4 total and all held up well. Will be a staple at parties to come.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Ball of Fun hehehe
customer_reviews.text: Used these for org day at work. Totally worth it! We all felt like kids again. Blew them up with ease and deflated just as easily. Love that they come with their own storage bags. These have become a big hit at family functions as well. I
customer_reviews.author: Chekelia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and build!
customer_reviews.text: We bought four of these for our church Halloween Outreach. Instead of renting knockerballs and use for 2 hours we decided to invest in these. They worked well! Comes with storage bag to keep it clean and organized.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Hamster ball
customer_reviews.text: They have worked well and the kids have had a blast with them. Having a good pump makes all the difference. So if you are to get these you will definitely need one (and not the kind you use to pump up your car tires and such. You need one more designed to inflate portable mattresses and such).
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Carroll

customer_reviews.title: A New/Fun Experience
customer_reviews.text: We had a great time July 4th w/ these! A BLAST is more like it! Granted, they take a lot of air, but it’s worth it! We also stacked 2 on top of each other & threw toy balls down the middle like basketball!
customer_reviews.author: Hooker

customer_reviews.title: Nice and thick material, easy to patch when needed
customer_reviews.text: Nice and thick material, easy to patch when needed. Not a lot of space internally, for an adult. But durable enough for 250+ pound boys.
customer_reviews.author: William C Filippone

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery - carry bags are a nice touch.
customer_reviews.text: Family reunion. These were purchased fir a family reunion after using a similar product at company picnic. Have not had them long so can not rate for sturdiness or durability. Delivery was excellent. The carry bags are a bonus so they are portable as friends and family want to borrow them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, lots of fun, would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 4 of these for a birthday party. They are so much fun! We used our leaf blower to blow it up most of the way and then the air mattress pump the rest of the way otherwise it would have taken a while just using the pump. We left them inflated for a few weeks and used them often. We never had to refill the air or had any holes. The plastic seems very thick so I think we could successfully patch if it does happen.
customer_reviews.author: John J Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Durability outweighed by fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought a bunch of these for our youth ministry. The smaller size is better for middle school and the larger size (5ft) is better for high school. Inflating takes a long time unless you have a powerful plugin pump. No pops, no leaks, thick and durable material as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Just another guy

customer_reviews.title: worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This bumper ball has brought a lot of fun to my children. When I go to the park for a picnic, I take it to the grass to let the children roll over. My children like it and it is worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: paul shao

customer_reviews.title: Super fun for whole family!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and was pleased with the quality of the bumper balls. We have a family reunion every summer and enjoyed this new addition to our activities. Fit everyone there and was such a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Juli A. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Leaker
customer_reviews.text: Only used twice and has deflated both times. Thought maybe I didn't close the fill cap tight enough but that still didn't solve the leak. This was too expensive for this to happen so soon...only me and my kids were the ones playing with them..not happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are so much fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our teenagers had a great time with these balls. Sometimes the straps that hold the ball onto you come undone when someone knocks you over. But great fun, everyone loved it. Great way to stay distant but still have fun under quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: MaryT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a ball like this for adults & it’s perfect. High quality material. You can deliver some hard hits!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for Christmas. Both got holes on the first day. They are garbage now. Giant waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: right away got leaks
customer_reviews.text: Not made to withstand teenage boys wanting to play outside rough
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought another one for my friend's kids and they loved it!!!
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Had so much fun,these are very sturdy for children and adults bought 2
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: bought two of these, they kids haven't stopped playing with them all day. They seem very sturdy, and we blew it up with the leaf blower.
customer_reviews.author: Mamagotidea

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these for a graduation party and they were a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Halpin

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: They inflate; they come with a patch kit too and a nice carrying bag. Good product; better than renting all the time.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Will definitely buy it again. I bought two already🤤
customer_reviews.author: Beto Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! We bought 4 and had so much fun. I couldn't get up because I was laughed so hard. They're very durable and sturdy. We will be ordering 2 more soon so more people can join.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Villanueba

customer_reviews.title: Human ball for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: The ball came earlier than suggested which was great. The ball was a gift for my grandson and he uses it to roll down hills and show other children how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Smith

customer_reviews.title: A BIG BALL OF FUN!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so they’re a little expensive but the amount of fun you’ll have in one of these outweighs the price. This is what memories are made of and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Xtreme Juice

customer_reviews.title: Bought two and one has a hole
customer_reviews.text: We bought two and one of them has a pretty big hole. The other one worked.
customer_reviews.author: Dudijess

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 of the 4 came with the upgraded shoulder straps as advertised
customer_reviews.text: As far as the bumper balls themselves, they are a lot of fun, everyone really loved them. But the problem is that I bought 4 and only one of the 4 came with the upgraded shoulder straps, now I have the hassle of trying to get the other 3 replaced to the product that is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my adult children and grandchildren. Super fun! Holds up well. Great exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Hertel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Easy to inflate. Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: We love these balls. We use them every week full force for our king of the ring and they hold up very well. Easy to inflate. Very sturdy and we’ve already had 2 other families purchase them. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Milliyon Musiq

customer_reviews.title: Awesome outdoor fun
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to blow up even with an air compressor. Well worth the wait to watch the kids slam into each other and roll down hills
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved it. It's very sturdy and holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Hester

customer_reviews.title: Fun and worth it
customer_reviews.text: It does take some time to pump around 10mins with electric pump. But so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: hueyaeyang

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness these were a big hit at our youth VBS this year
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Durham

customer_reviews.title: 1 of 2 deflates by just sitting, in 2 hours
customer_reviews.text: They seem robust. But, right out of the box, 1 deflates in 1 to 2 hours just sitting around :(
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone-watching and in the bubble
customer_reviews.text: My family and I purchased two of these to have on vacation at the lake. We all had so much fun! A bunch of 20 years running into each other couldn’t be more enjoyable. Would definitely recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 19 yr old son and his friends. He said best gift he got in past 6 years!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for college students. They absolutely love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: It was the biggest hit for Christmas this year. Well made. Easy to inflate/deflate. Kids 7-15 are having a blast
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Comes with no pump
customer_reviews.text: So much fun but if you don’t own a air compressor it could take forever to fill!
customer_reviews.author: Airen Perry

customer_reviews.title: A fun outdoor game, full of laughs
customer_reviews.text: The game was a lot of fun. It was a safe and funny way for my teenagers to run and crash into each other.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Need new return label
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I was out of town and my return label expired. I need a new one to ship back defected product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: split in seam
customer_reviews.text: purchased 2 and one got a split in seam please replace ball or second patching kit
customer_reviews.author: patricia M. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved this. It was heavier than I had imagined but I would say that’s why it’s so durable.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for an adult "field day" and it was a hit! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Strong enought for a 240 lb  6'3 man
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a high school pep rally. They are sturdy and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Plug broke on day 1. Need a leaf blower, else will take forever to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for summer fun!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Kids loved it!! Well built and very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

product_meta.title: Body Bumper Bubble Soccer Balls for Kids/Adults, 5 FT Zorb Ball 1 Pack
feature_bullets: ⚽BATURU Body Bumper ball is made of 0.8 mm ultra thick PVC, nontoxic and odorless. The bubble balls featured with excellent wear resistance, tear resistance, better sealing performance, and ductility.
⚽ EASY TO INFLATE: You can inflate the bubble balls with the electronic air pump, compressor and air mattress pump for minutes.(PUMP NOT INCLUDED)
⚽ GREAT BEARING CAPACITY: BATURU bubble balls supports weight to 250 lbs. Much more durable and safer than you think!
⚽ COMFY& ERGONOMIC DESIGN: The handles fit the shape of a human finger and make the bumper ball more comfortable to hold.
⚽SPECIFICATION: Bubble ball dia: 5 ft/1.5 m, Inside Dia: 1.9 ft/0.58 m, height: 4.1 ft/1.25 m. Suitable for normal size player: Height 4.8 ft to 6.3 ft, Weight: 100 to 250 lbs. 60 days no risk return
